headline: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (ODFL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. on Value & Error’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ODFL. Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc.’s share was trading at $171.65 as of December 30th. ODFL’s trailing and forward P/E were 34.54 and 33.56, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Old Dominion […]
